subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ third baseman had 77 strikeouts, tied for third in the majors, but his 52 R.B.I. were third in the majors, and first in the National League.
snippet: The Mets’ third baseman had 77 strikeouts, tied for third in the majors, but his 52 R.B.I. were third in the majors, and first in the National League.
